Gray did for reasonable prices.

text: Great pizza a couple steps up from the standards. Fire cooked, thin crispy crust. Pretty sure they just cook personal size pizza. Not the small 4 slice pizza size, more like a 6 slices, but smaller than a medium pizza. I had 2 slices left ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephen Schleiger
text: Thought I would try to order a delivery from an ad in the paper. Had to install the app then the offer code was not recognized. I tried an alternative order and when that could not be delivered I gave up.

name: 3PairDesigns
text: The food is good, but has declined slightly since it opened. 4 stars is due to the service. I felt like the service was cold and unhelpful.  Their service has really gone downhill. They barely cut the pizza, rolled their eyes after THEY asked if we wanted anything else, and the pizza crust was slightly under cooked.

name: Wolf Bury
text:
Salad was warm and plain, so much for the "fresh fruit and goat's milk cheese."
Pizza is extremely thin and chewy.
Sauce was good. ‚Ä¶More

name: Colin Richardson
text: I have been a frequent customer but my last experience on August 18 @6:48 PM really disappointed me. The rep Caroline was very rude!!! I ordered 2 build your owns. One of them I wanted veggies first and then cheese on them, which is normal ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex B
text: First time here. Opted to go with the original dough and build my own pizza... very good!!! Definitely will be back!

name: Sarah Real
text: Tasty & affordable vegan pizza, 2 large 2 topping pizza for $20. We get garlic sauce, vegan cheese, bell pepper and arugula with some red bell pepper and pesto on top. Super yum.

name: Al C
text: This was an extremely enjoyable experience. All of the staff was extremely friendly and I met and spoke to the owner. He runs an extremely tight ship. If your sceptical about it I would say give it a try.

name: Denise Anderson
text: That was the worst pizza I've ever ate.  Where was the cheese 10 pieces of olives on the one pizza the other was the pineapple.  You people need to learn how to make pizza.  Final words GROSS!!

name: lady romero
text: Pizza was delicious only 3 ppl there were like the best ppl there other than that the customer service sucked. I should have known when a person from grubhub was on his phone yelling how unorganized and how they didnt have the order right or on time. They forgot my salad but Sarahi brought it to me and asked if it was fine.

name: Brian Eby
text: Staff is always friendly, service is great, and the pizza always tastes delicious!  Endless combinations and fresh ingredients make this my favorite build your own pizza place.  Still need to try the dough knots but they always look good when I see others eating them.

name: Sandi S
text: So glad to have this wonderful pizza spot in South Reno. I always make sure and buy my pizza there when we have a pizza party at Five Hearts preschool! Great service and great food!

name: Ethan Gonzales
text: It was my first time here, and it was awsome. The employees where very friendly and helpful, the pizza was really good, you actually had sprite instead of sierra mist, and the price wasn't that bad for the quality of the food. I will ‚Ä¶More

name: luke bowers
text: Absolutely delicious pizzas! Friendly service. clean tables and restroom. The fountain drinks were great. The lemonade was great. Just everything way awesome, we will definitely be going back soon!

name: Mr Craig
text: Tried to use their App offering 3.14 special and it just stays on the "New PI DAY REWARD" screen with QR code, unable to order and showed "count down" clock. Then we had to order by phone, by the time we got there it had expired at they ‚Ä¶More

name: Raybro 1
text: Very friendly staff that just makes the whole experience that much better. I will say the openness and just the casual talk with one of the employees ‚ÄùDaniel‚Äù was actually really nice and me being someone not from Nevada Reno made me feel a lot more welcomed and comfortable. Pizza one of the best and has the juice.

name: Richard Furleigh
text: Been here twice so far and have had exceptional experiences both times! The quality of everything was amazing: the dough, toppings, rotating selection of aguas frescas, all of it. One pie is enough for two people as far as I'm concerned and ‚Ä¶More

text: I love this place! At first I was kinda weirded by the idea of a build it yourself pizza, but the flavors here leave you nothing to be worried about. Start off with a prebuilt pizza and add to it or start one from scratch! You can add ‚Ä¶More

text: They don‚Äôt train there employees well, neither know how to talk to them. The manager Caroline is always on their phone in the back and the manager Bmoe is a coward who can‚Äôt touch base with their employees. It‚Äôs a dirty restaurant, with no sense of direction.

name: Joyce Day-Nunes
text: Very good! Friendly

name: Trulie McCabe
text: This is a very disappointing experience once again. I have ordered pizzas to go in the last two months and everything I got was completely wrong but I thought I‚Äôd give it another try since it‚Äôs close to home. I pulled up and ordered on the ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Brucklacher
text: Everyone was friendly, but not like "Wells Fargo gun-to-the-back bank teller" friendly, they felt honestly friendly.  It was an enjoyable experience watching them go through the process and they turned out pizzas quick despite the busy ‚Ä¶More

name: Lisa Brooks
text: Decided to have blaze pizza tonight with my family and was very impressed to see the girl with pinkish hair and tattoos on her arms working the oven, I think her name was Caroline. Over all great experience as always! Will definitely be returning soon.

name: James Powell
text: I went to this location a few days ago. I was very unsatisfied with my experience. The girl with the blonde hair named lex showed such attitude and no customer service that we will no longer come to this location. We‚Äôd much rather drive the ‚Ä¶More

name: G-trooper g
text: If I'm going to get quick fired pizza I prefer Blaze over Mypie by a thousand percent. The crust/sauce and toppings are superior, they pump out your order fast/efficient. Great prices for what you get and how you like it made.

name: Robin Levesque
text: Little under staffed for lunch hour but the pizza is amazing.

name: Wynnr
text: Good pizza and 2 gluten free options, neither of which is awful.  If they are busy, expect skimping on toppings.  I recommend requesting extra cheese in order to get a decent covering of cheese

name: jon gerusa
text: Awesome experience, solid pizza. I liked the creativity with flavors, I had a basil pesto sauce with spiced olive oil drizzled on top of tons of ingredients... As you can see...

name: Bonnie L
text: Delicious pizza... great crust and just the right amount of sauce cheese and pepperoni!  Although I had a bad experience using the app to place an order which ended up in their Roseville location, the staff corrected the situation promptly. ‚Ä¶More

name: David GO
text: Love almost everything about it, only complaint would be that they never change gloves when I tell them I have a food allergy. But other then that good, quick and friendly service

name: Dylan Quiring
text: Good pizza. You build whatever you want and they are all sold as personal pizzas. A little pricey for food, but you get a good amount. I usually have plenty leftover for later.

name: Sherri Fray
text: Them team seemed unexperienced  as well as the manager was rude to the team I got the wrong pizza they were not willing to remake

name: Linda Allen
text: Cauliflower and the gluten free crusts are great. Love the build your own opinion.

name: stacy dull
text: Some of the best pizza I've ever eaten..very cool environment..we will be back..

name: Landan OConnor
text: Not bad pizza at all ok service when there isn't a bunch of new people. Worth going nothing special.

name: Mina Hoskins
text: AMAZING pizza place. Not traditional by any means, ofc. You know that whole "pick two of three" chart here? Throw it away. It's good, it's fast, and it's cheap. Any pizza, your way, with nice ingredients, fast. What more could you ask for? ‚Ä¶More

name: happy inreno
text: They no longer carry vegan gluten free crust.  Their pizza toppings are lacking.  MOD Ihas a much better selection vegan and gluten free options.

name: Adventure Sports Guy
text: The perfect pizza. What you want for the right price. Thin crust with toppings galore. The gluten free crust is kind of lacking though. Haven't had much of the other creations such as salads and dough bites. Yummy cookies, smore cookies, and brownies available too.

name: Julie Rivera
text: Pizza was amazing as usual but when walking into the restaurant tonight at 8:30 p.m. all of the employees looked at us like what are you doing here? Also upon paying for our pizza Brittany asked us is it for here or to go? I said for here ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamie Thomas
text: It was quick and tasty like always

name: Beverly Ryan
text: Great fresh food always.

name: Jennifer Kielius
text: The pizza is just fine and decently priced, but this place has some of the worst customer service I have ever experienced. Every. Single. Time. I‚Äôve worked in plenty customer service jobs - dealt with a**holes every day and not getting paid ‚Ä¶More

name: Shintaru Sheno'tan
text: Fast-fired to order. Flat fee per pizza so go toppings crazy. Polite staff, good food and more freaky fresh than any cold cuts and bread.

name: clifton Sykes
text: Great pizza.  Really liked being able to see and customize the pizza.  Super helpful staff.

name: Jim Cannel
text: Great pizza and staff.  Would have received a five star rating, but every time I‚Äôve been in they‚Äôre out of keto crust

name: Charity Adams
text: We love blaze! Just double check your online order before you take away. They frequently leave off the drizzles.

name: Faraz Saeed
text: Honestly blaze Pizza is my go to for pizza. Where else can you get amazing pizza with super fast service for an even more amazing price! The service is quick and the food is great. All the servers where very nice and the restaurant was clean and well managed. I can't recommend this place enough. It's a must try!

name: Andrew Hanson
text: Good pizza! Unlimited toppings for same price is fantastic.  Gluten free crust is available also, and service is fast.

name: David Moser
text: Glad we found this one!! Good pizza, cheap prices and pretty quick service. Will definitely be back.

name: Bettie BAW
text: Vegan crust, lots of veggies, build your own pizza, delish

name: K M
text: Who doesn't love a build your own pizza that is ready as quickly as most fast food is ready!? It's also cheap! The store was clean and the staff seemed to really be enjoying themselves which made being there more enjoyable.

name: Marie West
text: First time there and I enjoyed it thoroughly. I was really pleased with the pricing they have and felt welcome by the employees. I definitely plan to visit again.

name: Money Over Men
text: Not bad. Wish their salads had more of a variety.  Pizza was ok. I'm too used to deep dish.

name: Scott Wittig
text: Love this place

name: vaping Otter
text: This place is awesome. You get your own pizza made up right away the way you want it. And the employees are fun

name: Bill Schrimpf
text: This was my first visit, I left a happy customer and will come back.  It's a good pizza, not the best but good.  What is great, is the value.  I got a 12 inch pizza with 4 topping and a soda for $10.  The service was excellent, and my pizza was cooked in about 5 minutes.

name: Cassaundra Clark
text: best pizza in town! super fast, delicious and priced for any budget! I got the build your own, any toppings same price as the other pizzas. definitely recommend.

name: Diamond Dayze
text: I love blaze the only problem I have is the one closest to me is next to Jersey Mike's so sometimes I have a hard time choosing where to go. Lol. But I always have a great experience and enjoy every bite

text: Was in town for work and wanted a quick but good bite and checked out the newly opened Blaze. ‚Ä¶More

name: Arden Heki
text: Blaze pizza states it closes at 10:00 pm, but they really close at 9:00 pm.  Staff was rude when we walked in and immediately turned us away although we got there at 8:45. Clearly didn't want to serve us since it appeared they were done cleaning up to close.

name: Justin Holden
text: Best pizza in town. Only been here once but will never go anywhere else. Bathroom was a little messy but pizza was perfection.

name: Dar
text: My new favorite pizza place. The pizza's are customizable and priced right!

name: Jennifer Fruge
text: Normally I don't have a problem with Blaze. However the last 2 times I've ordered online or delivery my order has been wrong. Not that the food is bad or unedible, (with the exception of the abundance of brown wilted lettuce in my ceasar salad today) but it's not what I've ordered.

name: Golf-hawk
text: Excellent pizza and customer service. I frequent this place often and I like how they ask you after each topping if the amount they place in the pie is enough for you. The cost is really good for the value. I‚Äôm a big fan and I‚Äôm hopeful you ‚Ä¶More

text: Their pizza is very fresh, and I love how many options they give for building your own. The service is always fast, and the employees are awesome.

name: Jason Nash

text: Really good pizza! I like the build-your-own option, and they're usually very liberal with toppings! Very reasonably priced, and a wide range of customizations. Don't stop by rush hour if at all possible... South Creek Pizza is still my favorite, but this is a fast alternative.

text: They make an ok pizza but there are better choices.  The crust and sauce are mediocre.  I am surprised by the ratings and assume the fact you can get your pizza fast is more important than taste. Their garlic knots are good but at a buck a piece pretty pricey.

text: Pizza always fresh and delicious. The line is usually long, so we utilize their app for ordering pizza. Takes about 10 minutes from ordering on app to having pizza packed ready to go. Definitely or new favorite!

awesome. Good gimmick. Order online. 11 inch pizzas. Fire grilled. Any toppings. But they were out of both kinds of salad and drink lids. Hard to juggle to go orders with open containers but the waitress helped me out to the car. Good staff
